title: Video Roundup: Inspiration from Matt Walker, Kate Courtney, Katy Winton and more
content:
There really is no shortage of high quality mountain bike videos floating about the internet at the moment. We’ve gathered four of the best for your viewing pleasure; a Home Run at Fort William from DH World Number 1, Matt Walker, Kate Courtney’s “Rising” following her strength training, the Lapierre-Zipp Collective Team Camp on the […]

The post Video Roundup: Inspiration from Matt Walker, Kate Courtney, Katy Winton and more appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
